name: ufront
description: Ufront is a client/server web framework written in Haxe.  This library contains links to common ufront libraries, and a command line tool to help you manage your ufront project.
releasenote: Version bumps. Mostly to do with removing the dependency on (and bundling of) the old `thx`, replacing it with a dependency on the new `thx.core`. The new library is not backwards compatible, so if you used thx much, upgrade with care.
